# contentVisibleFrame

**Instance Property**

The visible area of content in the scroll view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency var contentVisibleFrame: CGRect { get set }
```

## Discussion

Modifying this property immediately moves the canvas, to animate changing the visible rect use [doc://com.apple.paperkit/documentation/PaperKit/PaperMarkupViewController/setContentVisibleFrame(_:animated:)].
title: contentVisibleFrame
